brand: Web Developer experienced with both Front-End and Back-End web development, including exposure to: Node.js, AngularJS and various JavaScript and MVC frameworks; jQuery and AJAX; developing, integrating and consuming RESTful APIs; and principles of Responsive Web Design by way of developing Cross-Browser, Platform-Agnostic User Interfaces.

Sociable and inquisitive team player with a passion for learning and continuous self-improvement.  Highly detail-oriented; well-attuned to matters of business, and of the human psyche.  Enjoys exploring the potential of new technologies and innovations.  Likes people.  Allergic to cats.
